search.query: |tstats dc(name) where `gcp_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="k8s.io/Node" by name,resource.data.metadata.name, resource.data.metadata.annotations.container.googleapis.com/instance_id,resource.data.metadata.labels.beta.kubernetes.io/instance-type, resource.data.metadata.labels.kubernetes.io/hostname, resource.data.metadata.labels.cloud.google.com/gke-nodepool, resource.data.status.nodeInfo.containerRuntimeVersion | rename name as Name,resource.data.metadata.name as NodeName, resource.data.metadata.annotations.container.googleapis.com/instance_id as Instance_ID, resource.data.metadata.labels.beta.kubernetes.io/instance-type as InstanceType, resource.data.metadata.labels.kubernetes.io/hostname as HostName, resource.data.metadata.labels.cloud.google.com/gke-nodepool as NodePool, resource.data.status.nodeInfo.containerRuntimeVersion as containerRuntimeVersion | eval ProjectID=replace(Name,"^\S+projects\/(\S+)\/(zones|locations)\S*","\1") | eval Zone=replace(Name,"^\S+(zones|locations)\/(\S+)\/clusters\S*","\2") | eval ClusterName=replace(Name,"^\S+clusters\/(\S+)\/k8s\S*","\1")
search ProjectID IN ($project_id_tok$)|stats count by Zone
search ProjectID IN ($project_id_tok$) AND Zone IN ($zone_tok$)|stats count by ClusterName
| mcatalog values(_dims) as Dims WHERE index=* AND metric_name=container.googleapis.com/container/* | mvexpand Dims |search NOT Dims IN ("metricKind","resourceType","valueType")

| mstats avg(_value) prestats=true WHERE metric_name="container.googleapis.com/container/cpu/utilization" AND index="gcp_metrics" AND project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND zone IN ($zone_tok$) AND cluster_name IN ($cluster_tok$) span=$secs_for_bin$s $dims_tok$ | timechart avg(_value) as Avg span=$secs_for_bin$s $multiline$ $dims_tok$ | fields - _span* VALUE

| mstats avg(_value) prestats=true WHERE metric_name="container.googleapis.com/container/memory/bytes_used" AND index="gcp_metrics" AND project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND zone IN ($zone_tok$) AND cluster_name IN ($cluster_tok$) span=$secs_for_bin$s $dims_tok$ | timechart avg(_value) as Avg span=$secs_for_bin$s $multiline$ $dims_tok$ | fields - _span* VALUE

| mstats avg(_value) prestats=true WHERE metric_name="container.googleapis.com/container/memory/bytes_total" AND index="gcp_metrics" AND project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND zone IN ($zone_tok$) AND cluster_name IN ($cluster_tok$) span=$secs_for_bin$s $dims_tok$ | timechart avg(_value) as Avg span=$secs_for_bin$s $multiline$ $dims_tok$ | fields - _span* VALUE

| mstats avg(_value) prestats=true WHERE metric_name="container.googleapis.com/container/cpu/reserved_cores" AND index="gcp_metrics" AND project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND zone IN ($zone_tok$) AND cluster_name IN ($cluster_tok$) span=$secs_for_bin$s $dims_tok$ | timechart avg(_value) as Avg span=$secs_for_bin$s $multiline$ $dims_tok$ | fields - _span* VALUE

| mstats avg(_value) prestats=true WHERE metric_name="container.googleapis.com/container/cpu/usage_time" AND index="gcp_metrics" AND project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND zone IN ($zone_tok$) AND cluster_name IN ($cluster_tok$) span=$secs_for_bin$s $dims_tok$ | timechart avg(_value) as Avg span=$secs_for_bin$s $multiline$ $dims_tok$ | fields - _span* VALUE

| mstats avg(_value) prestats=true WHERE metric_name="container.googleapis.com/container/disk/bytes_used" AND index="gcp_metrics" AND project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND zone IN ($zone_tok$) AND cluster_name IN ($cluster_tok$) span=$secs_for_bin$s $dims_tok$ | timechart avg(_value) as Avg span=$secs_for_bin$s $multiline$ $dims_tok$ | fields - _span* VALUE

| mstats avg(_value) prestats=true WHERE metric_name="container.googleapis.com/container/disk/bytes_total" AND index="gcp_metrics" AND project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND zone IN ($zone_tok$) AND cluster_name IN ($cluster_tok$) span=$secs_for_bin$s $dims_tok$ | timechart avg(_value) as Avg span=$secs_for_bin$s $multiline$ $dims_tok$ | fields - _span* VALUE

|tstats fillnull_value="null" count where `gcp_index` sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message data.protoPayload.serviceName="k8s.io" data.resource.labels.cluster_name IN ($cluster_tok$) data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) by _time, data.resource.labels.project_id,data.logName,data.protoPayload.resourceName, data.resource.type, "data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail",data.protoPayload.serviceName, data.protoPayload.methodName, data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp, data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerSuppliedUserAgent data.labels.authorization.k8s.io/decision data.labels.authorization.k8s.io/reason | rename data.resource.labels.project_id as ProjectID, data.logName as LogName, data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail as Email,data.protoPayload.serviceName as ServiceName, data.protoPayload.resourceName as ResourceName, data.resource.type as ResourceType, data.protoPayload.methodName as MethodName, data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp as CallerIP, data.protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerSuppliedUserAgent as UserAgent data.labels.authorization.k8s.io/decision as Decision data.labels.authorization.k8s.io/reason as Reason
| eval annotation_category ='Decision'+", "+'Reason' |eval annotation_label ='MethodName' |top limit=1000 _time, annotation_label, annotation_category |table _time, annotation*
